page.title: 09TRADE IN COVINGHAM E.SWINDON
page.content: We asked the manager of the{betting {shop}William Hill what was the biggest bet ever put on in his shop? He said it was Â£2,000 and the biggest win he ever paid out was Â£12,000.The manager of A.G.FRY said that Mars was the most popular{sweet }but Wispa has been more popular.In the Chip shop we asked how many{potatoes}did he use a week.He said he used a ton a week. In the video shop the best seller was {Conan The Destroyer. Next we went in the supermarket and asked the manager what was the most popular{foods.}He replied "Baked beans,meat,milk and bread .Next we went to the chemist and asked what is the best selling{toothpaste.}She replied "Macleans".
